outputs.output_descr: The project will provide a programme framework to facilitate RBA support to the Human Development ( HD) Analysis and Reporting process in sub-Saharan Africa.  The expected outcome will be production of Regional and sub-regional HDRs and strengthened institutional capacity for HD analysis, measurement and advocacy.

project_descr: RAF07/001- Regional Initiative on Human Development Reports in Sub-Saharan Africa
project_title: RAF07/001- Reg. Initiative on HDR- Sub Saharan Africa
